statements: DELETE FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column1 = 1 AND column2 = 'value1' AND column3 = 3.14;
DELETE FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column3 < 5 AND column2 LIKE '%example%' AND column1 >= 10;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 200 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'

DELETE FROM orders
WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM order_items
WHERE quantity <= 2 AND item_total <= 50.00;
